fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a New Moon, copy a fellow Were member's ability, using it again on the same target.
- During a Full Moon, copy any non-killing night ability from a Were role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Abilities you copy retain the original role's attributes that are tied to that ability.
- You may only copy an ability from any given role once.
- Hunting Moon Enhancement: **Master of the Night** â€” You may copy any non-killing night ability that any role has.
